recipesJson.name: Sweet Summer Chilled
recipesJson.author: Apexified
recipesJson.description: As its invigorating tart kiwi bite quickly gives way to full-bodied juicy sweetness, this exemplifies the supremacy of the Arctic Beauty variety of the emerald fruit over its fuzzy brother. Served cold as the winds on the snowy slopes of Caradhras, it makes for a guaranteed refresher.

reviews.text: With many recipes these days trying to authentically recreate our favorite food and drink, attempting to capture the very essense of an abstract concept or feeling in vape form, sometimes they can become quite complex. Sometimes when striving for perfection or trying to recreate the wheel...we forget the pleasure of the simple things in life, like how good a glass of water tastes after going for a jog on a hot day. Well this is that glass of water (or cucumber water if you're a fancy rich person). It's mainly kiwi with the honeydew singing backup, not overly sweet or tart, and it's light, crisp and refreshing. While working outside yesterday in 95 degree weather, this was a simple pleasure to have on hand.

Cold, Sweet, Tart, Juicy, and refreshing. This hits every note you want in a summer recipe and it does it with nuance and transformative properties. Easily a 5 star recipe by an excellent mixer. I can already tell I'm going to be mixing up a 120 as soon as i polish off this 30.

I had the pleasure of previewing this recipe before it was released and found it to be incredible. It starts with that tart crispness like biting into a skin-on kiwi but without the fur, followed by a satisfying deluge of sweet juicy goodness with an icy finish.  Great work, Apex!
